altername_name: The Adventures of Jane Jelly 2: The Treasure of Hotmarmalade
The Adventures of Jane Jelly 2: The Treasure of Hot Marmalade
name: The Adventures of Jane Jelly: The Treasure of Hot Marmalade
overview: After successfully locating the treasure of Zedin and returning it to her father's friend, Jonathan, Jane has been assigned another mission. Enter the dangerous "Forest of hot marmalade" and bring home its lots treasure! From Jonathan's research, it seems that Jane will need to locate 10 different rune keys in order to access the final treasure room. The forest is fully of wild creatures, deadly plants, poachers, quicksand, skeletons, terrible traps and more. Complete the game by finding the treasure and making your way to your trusted jeep.
